name: Avoid Programs with more than X Functions (EGL)
description: This rule searches for all programs having less than X Functions. X is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output: This report lists the following information: Program Full Name, Number of Functions
rationale: For maintainability and readability reasons, Programs should not have too many Functions
reference: Standard suggestions based on CAST Quality Model
remediation: Try to reduce the number of Programs having more than X Functions.
